comment: Theorem 19.12 of [Margaris] p. 89. Assuming the converse is a mistake sometimes made by beginners! But sometimes the converse does hold, as in ~ 19.12vv and ~ r19.12sn . (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Jan-2018.)
